Bayonne.Naval Station New York:
Naval Station New York was a United States Navy Naval Station on Staten Island in New York City, closed in 1994.
Opened in 1990, it was part of the Reagan administration's Strategic Homeport program. The station had two sections: a Strategic Homeport in Stapleton where ships docked, and a larger section occupying Fort Wadsworth, where administrative offices and bachelor and family housing were located.
